en_US.project_summary: Incorporated in Hong Kong, supported by the mainland and targeting in global market, CMB International Capital Corporation Limited (“CMBI”) is an integrated financial institution providing comprehensive and professional services.

zh_CN.project_summary: 招银国际金融有限公司（“招银国际”）是一家立足香港、深植内地、面向全球的全方位、专业化综合金融服务机构。
